directions: Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour purée into a sieve lined with a double thickness of cheesecloth set over a bowl and let drain, undisturbed, 30 minutes. Discard solids in sieve. Pour liquids into molds and freeze at least 24 hours. Add sticks when mixture is slushy, about 1 hour.
ingredients: 4 cups (1/2-inch pieces) peeled ripe honeydew melon (1)
Special equipment: 6 (1/3-cup) ice pop molds and 6 wooden sticks
title: Midori Melon Ice Pops
